headline: Motorola Focuses on Inorganic Growth to Augment Market Position
summary: MSI has been very active on the acquisition front to expand its geographical presence and extend its operating portfolio.

headline: Motorola Solutions Expands Avigilon Enterprise Security Suite to Accelerate Response During Emergencies
summary: CHICAGO, March 31, 2025--Motorola Solutions (NYSE: MSI) today announced several new advanced features in its Avigilon physical security suite, debuting Alta SOS this week at ISC West. The new features for Avigilon Alta and Avigilon Unity unify enterprises’ physical security solutions to better protect employees, visitors and service providers, and directly coordinate with public safety.

raw.headline: Motorola Solutions Expands Avigilon Enterprise Security Suite to Accelerate Response During Emergencies
raw.summary: CHICAGO, March 31, 2025--Motorola Solutions (NYSE: MSI) today announced several new advanced features in its Avigilon physical security suite, debuting Alta SOS this week at ISC West. The new features for Avigilon Alta and Avigilon Unity unify enterprises’ physical security solutions to better protect employees, visitors and service providers, and directly coordinate with public safety.

headline: Motorola Solutions to Acquire InVisit, Cloud-Based Visitor Management Solution Provider
summary: CHICAGO, March 31, 2025--Motorola Solutions (NYSE: MSI) has entered into a definitive agreement to acquire InVisit, a cloud-based visitor management solution provider, based in Calabasas, California. The acquisition will expand Motorola Solutions’ cloud-native Avigilon Alta security suite for enterprise customers, helping to better tackle rising security threats on people, operations and assets in organizations worldwide.
